channel.description: 25 IPv6 Routing Tuesday, August 31, 2021 2:58 PM they re-add these routes when the interface is again in a working (up/up) state Examples of Local IPv6 Routes show ipv6 route local command Static IPv6 Routes static routes require direct configuration with the ipv6 route command the ipv6 route command begins with the prefix and prefix length. Then the respective commands the list the directions of how this router should forward packets toward that destination subnet or ipv6 route command begins with the prefix and prefix length. Then the respective commands prefix by listing the outgoing interface or the address of the next-hop router. A static route on R1, for this subnet, will begin witheither the outgoing interface (S0/0/0) or the next-hop IPv6 address, or both. ipv6 route 2001:DB8:1111:2::/64, followed by
